articles.author: Kiona N. Smith
articles.title: Hominins suffered lead poisoning starting at least 2 million years ago - Ars Technica
articles.description: A recent study found lead in teeth from 2 million-year-old hominin fossils.

articles.author: Daniel Lawler
articles.title: 'Wetware': Scientists use human mini-brains to power computers - Tech Xplore
articles.description: Inside a lab in the picturesque Swiss town of Vevey, a scientist gives tiny clumps of human brain cells the nutrient-rich fluid they need to stay alive.
articles.content:
Inside a lab in the picturesque Swiss town of Vevey, a scientist gives tiny clumps of human brain cells the nutrient-rich fluid they need to stay alive.
It is vital these mini-brains remain healthy,… [+4934 chars]
